name: Within the Storm
description:
Web build is available but we highly recommend that you download and play the downloadable version because the lighting and shadows look better there compared to the web build.

You awake to find yourself in a dark, haunted house on a stormy night. What lies ahead? Why are you here? And why does this ghost keep bothering you? Gather information, but watch out! Who knows what lies within the storm...

Game developed by:
Akusan - Coder/Design
StarNavigator - Writer
Forte - Audio
Fixx - Artist
DisOneGuy - Artist
